metadata.title: CVE-2017-14167 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the load_multiboot function in hw/i386/multiboot.c in QEMU (aka Quick Emulator) allows local guest OS users to execute arbitrary code on the host via crafted multiboot header address values, which trigger an out-of-bounds write.

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.11+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
